content:
Cagliari President Tommaso Giulini concedes “the odds aren’t great” on Radja Nainggolan making his move from Inter permanent.
The Belgium international arrived on loan and the Corriere dello Sport believes a deal could be done for €15-20m, although his €4m p… [+740 chars]
